impression: [item] Small left pleural effusion with left base atelectasis. [item] New low-density lesions scattered throughout the liver, most compatible with metastases. [item] Extensive new lytic lesions throughout the visualized thoracolumbar spine, ssacrum and remainder the bony pelvis compatible with diffuse bony metastatic disease. [item] Presumed pathologic fractures through the left L2 and L3 transverse processes, bilateral sacral ala, bilateral superior and inferior pubic rami.
